CustomField.description: When checked this means this backup/delegate is active but not necessarily in effect. A backup/delegate can be active, in effect, or both. In order for requests to be actively assigned to the backup/delegate they must be active and in effect.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked this means this backup/delegate is active but not necessarily in effect. A backup/delegate can be active, in effect, or both. In order for requests to be actively assigned to the backup/delegate they must be active and in effect.
CustomField.label: Is Active
